input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product title:
Andrew Scott Mens 6 Pack Fleece Lined Base Layer Long-Sleeve Thermal Crew Neck Shirt

Product features:
100% Cotton
Machin Wash / Tumble Dry
100% Combed Cotton With Soft Underside Cotton Lining
SOFT & HEAVY Perfect Weight For Underwear Layering or Outer / Nightshirt
Bright White Thermal Flat Knit Fabric Crew with Stay Flat Collar
Felxible Hold in Place wrist openings
Super Value Pack of 6 Long Sleeve Thermal Crews - Save Big
Great for College / Winter Travel or no time for Laundry
Recommend buying a size up if a more roomy generous fit

Product description:
input_text.Response A:
Indulge in the luxurious comfort of our Andrew Scott Mens 6 Pack Fleece Lined Base Layer Long-Sleeve Thermal Crew Neck Shirt, crafted from premium 100% combed cotton with a soft underside cotton lining for ultimate softness and warmth. Engineered with a lightweight, yet durable flat knit fabric, this thermal crew features a stay flat collar and flexible hold-in-place wrist openings for unparalleled comfort and mobility.

Boasting a perfect weight for underwear layering or as an outer/nightshirt, this long-sleeve thermal crew is designed to keep you cozy and content throughout the day. Whether you're braving the chilly winter months or simply seeking an extra layer of warmth during your daily commute, this six-pack value pack ensures you're equipped with a range of stylish and functional shirts to suit any occasion.

Characterized by a bright white thermal flat knit fabric, these crew neck shirts exude a timeless appeal and versatility, allowing you to easily pair them with a variety of bottoms and outerwear. The machine wash and tumble dry construction ensures that maintaining the shirts' pristine condition is a breeze, while the 100% cotton composition guarantees breathability and long-lasting durability.

With a generous fit that allows for ease of movement and comfort, these long-sleeve thermal crews are perfect for college students, winter travelers, or anyone who values the convenience of having multiple layers at their disposal. The super value pack of six shirts offers an unparalleled savings opportunity, making it an exceptional investment for any wardrobe.

To ensure the optimal fit, we recommend purchasing a size up for a more roomy and generous fit. Don't miss out on the chance to elevate your wardrobe with the Andrew Scott Mens 6 Pack Fleece Lined Base Layer Long-Sleeve Thermal Crew Neck Shirt - an unrivaled combination of style, comfort, and value.
input_text.Response B:
Ooh, ooh! Look what we have here! It's a super fun pack of six thermal shirts for men, yay! 😄 These shirts are so soft and comfy, like wearing your favorite t-shirt but warmer! 🤗 They're made of 100% cotton, so they'll feel nice and snug on your skin. And, they have a special soft underside cotton lining that will make you feel like you're wearing a big hug! 🤗

These shirts are perfect for layering under your favorite clothes or wearing on their own, and they come in a bright white color that's so stylish! 😎 Plus, they have flexible wrist openings that will keep your sleeves in place, no matter what you're doing! 💪

The best part? You get six shirts for a super value price! 💰 That's like getting one free shirt, woohoo! 🎉 So, if you're looking for some cozy and stylish shirts for college, winter travel, or just no time for laundry, these thermal shirts are the perfect choice! 😄👍

Oh, and if you want a roomier fit, be sure to buy a size up! 😊 These shirts are so versatile and comfortable, you'll want to wear them all the time! 😍 So, what are you waiting for? Get your hands on these amazing thermal shirts today and stay warm and stylish all season long! 😄👍

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
